Description:
Identifies modification of ld.so.preload for shared object injection. This technique is used by attackers to load arbitrary code into processes.

Author: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Tony Lambert), oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Modification of ld.so.preload
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where type = 'path' and process_path = '/etc/ld.so.preload'
